input.subject: Did you receive our invoice INV-12345?
input.body:
Hi,

I'm following up to confirm whether you received our invoice INV-12345 for $15,000 against PO-98765, submitted on January 10th.

Please confirm receipt at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
Acme Audio LLC
input.erpContext:
ERP LOOKUP — Invoice INV-12345
Supplier: Acme Audio LLC
PO Number: PO-98765
Amount: $15,000
Status: received
Received Date: 2025-01-10
Payment Due: 2025-02-10
Scheduled Payment: 2025-02-08
Notes: Net-30 terms. 3-way match complete.

mustNot: I checked the ERP system independently

input.subject: Payment Status for INV-67890
input.body:
Hello AP Team,

Could you please provide an update on the payment status for invoice INV-67890 for $3,500? It was submitted on January 20th against PO-11223.

Best,
Bolt Electronics
input.erpContext:
ERP LOOKUP — Invoice INV-67890
Supplier: Bolt Electronics
PO Number: PO-11223
Amount: $3,500
Status: scheduled
Received Date: 2025-01-20
Payment Due: 2025-02-20
Scheduled Payment: 2025-02-18

mustNot: I checked the ERP system independently

input.subject: When will we be paid?
input.body:
Hi,

We submitted an invoice about 3 weeks ago and haven't heard back. When can we expect payment?

Thanks,
Supplier Team

input.subject: Missing Invoice Submission Confirmation
input.body:
Hello,

We submitted invoice INV-55501 via your supplier portal on January 28th but never received a confirmation email. Could you confirm whether it was received?

Globex Components

input.subject: Invoice Amount Discrepancy — PO-44556
input.body:
Dear AP Team,

We've noticed a discrepancy between our invoice (INV-55501 for $8,200) and the amount reflected in our remittance advice ($8,000). Could you please investigate this $200 difference?

Globex Components

input.subject: Cannot Upload Invoice — Portal Error
input.body:
Hello,

I'm trying to upload our invoice through your supplier portal but keep receiving the error: 'File type not supported.' I've tried both PDF and Excel formats.

This is urgent as the invoice is due by end of week. Please help.

Bolt Electronics

input.subject: URGENT: Legal Action Notice — Overdue Payment
input.body:
Dear Accounts Payable,

Despite multiple follow-ups, invoice INV-55501 for $8,200 is now 45 days past due. We have engaged our legal counsel and will pursue formal legal action and report this matter to collections if payment is not received within 5 business days.

Globex Components

input.subject: Past Due — We Will Stop Shipments
input.body:
Hello,

Our account shows three invoices totaling $24,000 are now past due. If we do not receive payment confirmation by Friday, we will be forced to pause all future shipments to your facility until the balance is resolved.

Apex Cables Inc

input.subject: How to Register as a New Supplier
input.body:
Hello,

Our company, Vertex Audio Systems, would like to become a registered supplier. Could you please let us know the process for getting set up in your system?

Thank you,
Vertex Audio Systems

mustNot: I added you to the system

input.subject: Limited Time Offer: Office Supplies 50% Off!
input.body:
Dear Business Owner,

Don't miss out on our incredible sale! Get 50% off all office supplies this week only. Click here to shop now.

Best deals guaranteed!
Deals4You Team

input.subject: RE: Invoice Discrepancy — Escalation
input.body:
Hi AP Team,

I'm following up on a billing discrepancy on INV-67890. Our records show we were charged $3,700 but our PO was for $3,500. I've copied our CEO, Michael Chen, on this email as this has been unresolved for 3 weeks.

Bolt Electronics

input.subject: Request to Update Banking Details for Payments
input.body:
Hello,

We recently changed our banking provider. Please update our remittance details to the following new bank account:
Bank: First National
Account: 9876543210
Routing: 021000021

Please confirm receipt of these new banking details.

Acme Audio LLC
